products.name: Grow Your Income in 3 Days
products.short_desc: Quick guide to boosting your income fast.
products.long_desc: Full guide with actionable tips to increase your income in just 3 days. Includes practical exercises, real-life examples, and step-by-step instructions to implement immediately.

products.name: Morning Routine Mastery
products.short_desc: Start your day with energy and focus.
products.long_desc: Complete guide to building a powerful morning routine that boosts productivity, mindset, and energy levels. Includes checklists and actionable steps.

products.name: Winning Mindset Guide
products.short_desc: Develop a mindset that drives success.
products.long_desc: Detailed strategies for cultivating a growth-oriented, resilient mindset that helps you achieve your personal and professional goals faster.

products.name: Overcoming Limiting Beliefs
products.short_desc: Break free from mental barriers holding you back.
products.long_desc: Step-by-step guide to identifying and overcoming limiting beliefs that prevent success. Includes exercises, examples, and mindset hacks.

products.name: Top 10 AI Tools for Entrepreneurs
products.short_desc: Streamline your business with the best AI tools.
products.long_desc: Comprehensive guide listing the top AI tools for automation, marketing, productivity, and analytics, including tutorials and tips on how to integrate them into your workflow.

products.name: AI Prompt Engineering Guide
products.short_desc: Master AI prompts to get the best results.
products.long_desc: Detailed instructions and examples for crafting effective AI prompts that maximize outputs from tools like ChatGPT, MidJourney, and other AI applications.

products.name: Complete WordPress Setup Guide
products.short_desc: Build a professional WordPress website from scratch.
products.long_desc: Step-by-step guide to setting up WordPress, installing themes and plugins, configuring WooCommerce, and deploying a fully functional online store.

products.name: Modern HTML & CSS Techniques
products.short_desc: Learn modern web design best practices.
products.long_desc: Learn advanced HTML5 and CSS3 techniques to create responsive, modern, and professional websites, including Flexbox, Grid, and animation effects.

products.name: Start Your Online Store
products.short_desc: Step-by-step to launch your digital store.
products.long_desc: Complete guide for creating an online store, setting up payments, adding products, and marketing for maximum profit with minimal cost.

products.name: Affiliate Marketing Guide
products.short_desc: Earn passive income through affiliate marketing.
products.long_desc: Detailed guide on affiliate marketing, including best platforms, strategies to increase conversions, and real-life examples to maximize earnings.

products.name: Social Media Marketing Mastery
products.short_desc: Grow your brand on social media effectively.
products.long_desc: Step-by-step guide on creating social media strategies, content planning, engagement, and paid advertising to boost online presence.

products.name: Email Marketing Automation
products.short_desc: Automate your email campaigns for more sales.
products.long_desc: Learn to create automated email sequences, manage subscribers, and increase conversions with actionable examples and templates.
